title: Ayurvedic Sleep Tea (Vata-Calming Blend)
excerpt: A soothing nighttime herbal tea featuring chamomile, jatamansi, lavender, and cardamom to calm Vata and support restful sleep.
content:
## What Is This Sleep Tea?
A calming herbal blend created to support deep rest and relaxation. It uses chamomile, jatamansi, lavender, and cardamom—an effective combination to settle Vata and ease mental restlessness.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Vata governs the nervous system and movement. When elevated, it causes sleeplessness, anxiety, and scattered thoughts. Warm, aromatic herbs help ground and soothe Vata at night.

### Key Benefits
- Promotes restful and sustained sleep.
- Helps calm a busy mind before bed.
- Supports nighttime digestion and relaxation.

## Ingredients
- Chamomile
- Jatamansi
- Lavender
- Cardamom

## Usage Instructions
- Drink **1 cup 30–60 minutes before bed**.
- Best enjoyed warm, in a quiet environment.

## Packaging
- Compostable tea sachets with brewing guide.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult a doctor if pregnant, on sedative medication, or dealing with chronic insomnia.

## Why Choose This Tea?
A gentle, aromatherapeutic herbal blend inspired by classical Vata-calming principles.
